title: David F. Carr Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by David F. Carr? Check out all of David F. Carr's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogDavid F. Carr David F. Carr David F. Carr is Editor, Insights News & Research, at Similarweb. He regularly covers topics including social media, digital advertising, and the explosion of interest in generative AI tech like ChatGPT. David has been writing about web trends and technologies since he was an editor at Internet World magazine in the mid-1990s. His areas of expertise include social media, collaboration and community technologies, healthcare IT and edtech, and he is the author of Social Collaboration for Dummies. You can connect with him on LinkedIn and follow him on Twitter. Show more Insights AI Podcasts Power Huge Growth for Google’s NotebookLM AI News by David F. Carr 2 Min.
